00019 #include "CommandMisc.h"
00020 
00021 class Command;
00022 class CommandOutputTarget;
00023 class CommandSignature;
00024 class wxString;
00025 
00026 class CommandType
00027 {
00028 private:
00029    wxString *mName;
00030    CommandSignature *mSignature;
00031 
00032 public:
00033    CommandType();
00034    virtual ~CommandType();
00035    wxString GetName();
00036    CommandSignature &GetSignature();
00037    wxString Describe();
00038 
00039    // Subclasses should override the following:
00040    // =========================================
00041 
00042    // Return the name of the command type
00043    virtual wxString BuildName() = 0;
00044 
00046    // names, validators and default values.
00047    virtual void BuildSignature(CommandSignature &signature) = 0;
00048 
00049    // Create a command instance with the specified output target
00050    virtual Command *Create(CommandOutputTarget *target) = 0;
00051 };
